alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:07PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pondera and southwestern Toole Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 407 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Conrad, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Conrad, Valier and Ledger. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 339 and 368. Highway 2 between mile markers 273 and 286. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for north central Montana.
